description: Try our easy to follow Malaysian Beef Laksa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Malaysian Beef Laksa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g green beans, trimmed, cut into 3cm lengths
270g udon noodles, cooked according to packet instructions
2 desiree potatoes, peeled, cut into 3cm pieces
400ml light coconut cream (or light coconut milk)
800g chuck steak, fat trimmed, cut into 3cm pieces (or boneless shin/gravy beef)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large non-stick frying pan over high heat. Add half of the beef and cook, turning, for 5-6 minutes or until browned; season to taste. Transfer to a plate. Repeat.

In the same fry pan, add onion, cook for 2 to 3 minutes, add paste and stir for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Return beef to pan and add coconut cream, stock and potatoes. Simmer for 25 to 30 minutes or until beef and potato are nearly tender.
Remove laksa from heat, stir through beans and capsicum; stand for 5 minutes to cook beans.
Meanwhile, cook udon noodles according to packet instructions. Strain and set aside.
Divide noodles among bowls, top with laksa and serve topped with bean sprouts, crushed peanuts, lime wedges, Thai basil & sliced chilli.
